attributes.action: not attend the England v Croatia football match on Wednesday 21st November
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The England v Croatia game is crucial to England's chances of qualifying for the 2008 European Championship.
The Prime Minister has an "unfortunate" effect whenever he has attended sporting events. Gordon Brown has attended the England v Germany football match, the Rugby World Cup Final between England and South Africa and the Scotland v Italy European Championship qualifier - each time the British team lost.
Given the importance of Wednesday's game, we make a heart-felt plea to the Prime Minister - "Please stay away"

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
